task.description: These are your custom tasks, sorted by latest updated.
task.custom: These are your specially created tasks

connect.title: Select unit (optional)
connect.description: You can (optionally) select a unit that will be linked with this task. If you don't select a unit the task will be available to any of your units.

preview.title: Preview
preview.description: This is a preview. Choose 'Continue and edit' to edit it with the task editor.

create.title: Create task
create.description: At this step you just create a new empty task.

continue.title: Please choose between the following
continue.description: Done! Do you wish to continue?

task.confirmDeleteLinked: You are about to finally delete the task "{{title}}". Deletion will also remove it from the following units: {{units}}
task.confirmDelete: SYou are about to finally delete the task "{{title}}".
